name: Cabaña la Bartola
description: Es un proyecto colaborativo donde participé junto a un amigo. Se trata de una plataforma web dedicada a ofrecer información y productos relacionados con mascotas exóticas como conejos, cuyes y erizos. La plataforma incluye secciones informativas detalladas y una tienda en línea para la compra de alimentos, jaulas y combos especializados.

name: PetMate Landing Page
description: Landing page for my school final project, which was about an App to control a pet feeder, the page was to show the team and what the project is about.

name: PetMate App
description: This is an App where you can control your PetMate (pet feeder), set a time and amount to feed them, have statistics about your pet's nutrition and status of the stock

name: Aroma's
description: Is a management app for a Uruguayan company, it is used to manage products, orders, shipments, employees, etc. I worked 3 months in the project as a fullstack developer. I can't share the Github
